amendment.description: To prohibit the use of funds for research, development, test, and evaluation, procurement, or deployment of nuclear armed interceptors in a missile defense system.

vote.text: Amendment SA 796 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 796 proposed by Senator Levin for Senator Feinstein. (consideration: CR S6836; text: CR S6836) To prohibit the use of funds for research, development, test, and evaluation, procurement, or deployment of nuclear armed interceptors in a missile defense system.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 796 proposed by Senator Levin for Senator Feinstein.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 796 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
